member.name: IParentAndItem.GetParentAndItem
member.summary: Gets the parent of an item and the parent's child ID.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the address of a PIDL that specifies the parent.
When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to the that is the parent.
When this method returns, contains the address of a child PIDL that identifies the object relative to that specified by ppsf.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IParentAndItem.SetParentAndItem
member.summary: Sets the parent of an item and the parent's child ID.
member.param: A pointer to the that is the parent.
A PIDL that is a child relative to psf.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IParentAndItem
member.summary: Exposes methods that get and set the parent and the parent's child ID. While IParentAndItem is typically implemented on IShellItems, it is not specific to .
